name: View Haul
description:
WAKE UP!

The truck's about to leave and it hasn't been loaded. Load as many TVs into the truck as you can before it leaves!

This game was made for Loading Screen Jam in about 24 hours.

Logo Font by Eeve Somepx and can be found in his font bundle.

"Pixelland" and "Theme for Harold (var. 1)" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
